turkish_example_sentence: Siz yaşlı komşuya bahçenizdeki taze sebzeleri toplamasına izin vermişseniz
english_example_sentence: If you had allowed the elderly neighbor to pick the fresh vegetables in your garden
russian_example_sentence: Если бы вы разрешили пожилому соседу собирать свежие овощи в вашем саду
